quote: In the movie business, the ones we call Lucky are usually those idiots who are just too damn stubborn to take no for an answer. Come to think of it, the movie business is kind of like life.
quote_letters: IN THE MOVIE BUSINESS THE ONES WE CALL LUCKY ARE USUALLY THOSE IDIOTS WHO ARE JUST TOO DAMN STUBBORN TO TAKE NO FOR AN ANSWER COME TO THINK OF IT THE MOVIE BUSINESS IS KIND OF LIKE LIFE
